Map006.Event[274].Page[1].list.message[0: "I'm Cahara of the South, a mercenary at your service."
Map006.Event[274].Page[1].list.message[3: "I do have a mission here, but let's save that story for
Map006.Event[274].Page[1].list.message[5: "I was caught by one of those malformed prison guards..."
Map006.Event[274].Page[1].list.message[7: Your conversation took an awkward turn for some reason...
Map006.Event[274].Page[2].list.message[0: "Uhh... I'm feeling kind of weak after being left here
Map006.Event[274].Page[2].list.message[1: "Would you mind if we travelled together for a while?"
Map006.Event[274].Page[2].list.message[5: "Eeh, except there doesn't seem to be room in your party."
Map006.Event[274].Page[2].list.message[6: "Well, I guess I can manage on my own too, no worries."
Map006.Event[274].Page[2].list.message[7: "Don't let the dungeon have it's way with you. Bye."
Map006.Event[274].Page[2].list.message[9: "Eeh, fine. I guess I'll manage on my own then."
Map006.Event[274].Page[2].list.message[1: "Don't let the dungeon have it's way with you. Bye."
Map006.Event[274].Page[4].list.message[2: The stone is radiating faint blue light.
Map006.Event[274].Page[4].list.message[5: No reaction. But it is satisfying.
Map006.Event[274].Page[4].list.message[6: You undress the mercenary and take the
